name: Space Shooting Game
description:
A simple space shooting game where clicking to destroy objects for scoring a higher score each time.

The games was only a  prototype for software graduation project  purpose and the development will be stopped  once the requirement is met for a finished product.

_______________________________ controls:
  • Use w,s,a,d or arrows keys to move
  •  Click the left click on mouse or press space on keyboard to  fire bullets
  •  E to use a shield
